page.title: 07ST. PAUL'S CHURCH
page.content:
{St.Paul's Church, Harold Hill,Romford. Name of Vicar: Rev. C. Carter. Denomination: Church of England.
{St.Paul's Church}is situated on a hill.The outside of the church is very plain and is approximately 30 years old. Information is provided outside of the entrance. As you enter the church you will notice a book stand on your left and information leaflets. Many Christian magazines can be ordered weekly or monthly. Books can be borrowed. There is 1 main hall that can be divided into two halls. They can be used for clubs or weddings etc.. There are no statues and very few pictures. In the church there is a{pulpit,}behind it at the far end is the{bell tower.}There are 2 rows of{pews }with prayer and hymn books.
